summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: James Dugald McPartland  was an American cornetist and one of the originators of Chicago Jazz. He worked with Eddie Condon, Art Hodes, Gene Krupa, Benny Goodman, Jack Teagarden, Tommy Dorsey and other jazz veterans, often leading his own bands.
title: Jimmy McPartland
